meanings.definition: Having a stomach or stomachs of a specified kind
meanings.sent1: The large stomached bear lumbered through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the round stomached cat lounging in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The tiny stomached mouse tried to eat a whole watermelon!
meanings.sent4: His stomached appetite for adventure led him to explore unknown lands.
meanings.sent5: The stomached elephant's hunger could not be satisfied.

meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of stomach
meanings.sent1: The picky eater was only satisfied with his delicate stomached diet.
meanings.sent2: The sensitive stomached child couldn't handle spicy food.
meanings.sent3: The stomached puppy refused to eat anything but treats.
meanings.sent4: Her iron stomached constitution allowed her to try exotic foods without worry.
meanings.sent5: The fragile stomached bird needed special care and attention.

meanings.definition: Having a stomach of a specified kind
meanings.sent1: The deep stomached whale could dive to incredible depths.
meanings.sent2: The narrow stomached bird could only eat small insects.
meanings.sent3: The stomached frog hopped happily after catching a fly.
meanings.sent4: His wide stomached appetite for knowledge led him to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The flexible stomached octopus could fit through tiny openings.
